welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Leisure World, where adventure and relaxation await you! Known for its charming atmosphere and endless opportunities for fun and exploration, we invite you to experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, Southwest, and other major carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines and Delta.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the primary hub for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport is primarily used for international flights and houses a variety of restaurants and shops.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login and have limited access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport.
